data.product_title: YVE LIFE Laser Cat Toys for Indoor Cats,The 4th Generation Real Random Trajectory Motion Activated Rechargeable Automatic Cat Laser Toy,Interactive Cat Toys for Bored Indoor Adult
about_product: 【The First Real Random Trajectory Automatic Cat Laser Toy】The built-in dual motor moves the laser point trajectory randomly, stimulating your pet's hunting instincts and keeping them engaged.For a better play experience, it is recommended to place the toy on a table at a height of 8-35 inches. Avoid positioning it near corners.

【Motion-Activated】When the smart sensor detects your pet moving, the YVE LIFE cat laser toy is automatically activated and works for 15 minutes before turning off. The sensor triggers once every 2 hours to conserve battery life (normal design).with a working distance of 0-13.1 ft. The pet must be within 0–4 meters of the device to activate the sensor.
【3 Speed Modes Available】The toy has 3 speed modes (fast/slow/mixed) to meet different exercise needs of cats. This interactive laser cat toy provides the best experience for indoor cats.

【Rechargeable Large Battery】The included USB rechargeable 1200 mAh battery is fully charged in 2.5 hours and provides up to 2 days of use.The product supports plug-in use, eliminating your worries. Use a 5V/1A standard USB charger only. Fast charging may damage the battery.Ensure the device is turned off before charging for normal functionality. If charging fails, try a different USB cable or charging adapter.

【Angle adjustable】By freely adjusting the angle of the laser head, you can make the toy shoot random laser dots on the ground or walls to satisfy your pet's preferences and make their playtime more exciting. The laser head can be manually adjusted within a 50° angle range vertically and automatically oscillates within a 60° angle range horizontally. For indoor use only. Avoid direct sunlight on the sensor area to prevent interference.Adjust the laser head direction before use to ensure proper angle alignment. If the laser dot doesn’t move, check the mode settings or battery level.
【Silent & Durable Motor】Durable dual motor direct drive, gearless structure for quieter operation, won't disturb your rest and work.

【Warm Tips】If any problem with the product, please let us know and we'll do anything we can to fix it. Do not disassemble the product; reach out to our team for issues.Store in a dry place, away from water. Keep out of reach of infants and young children.

product_information.Directions: 【El primer juguete de láser automático para gatos con trayectoria aleatoria real】El motor dual incorporado mueve la trayectoria del punto de láser de forma aleatoria, estimulando los instintos de caza de su mascota y manteniéndola involucrada. Para una mejor experiencia de juego, se recomienda colocar el juguete sobre una mesa a una altura de 20-90 centímetros 【Activado por movimiento】Cuando el sensor inteligente detecta que su mascota se mueve, el juguete de láser para gatos YVE LIFE se activa automáticamente y funciona durante 15 minutos antes de apagarse. El sensor solo puede ser activado una vez cada 2 horas, con un rango de funcionamiento de 0-4 【Tres modos de velocidad disponibles】El juguete tiene 3 modos de velocidad (rápido/lento/mezclado) para satisfacer las diferentes necesidades de ejercicio de los gatos. Este juguete interactivo de láser para gatos ofrece la mejor experiencia para los gatos indoor. 【Batería grande recargable】La batería recargable de 1200 mAh incluida con cable USB se carga completamente en 2,5 horas y ofrece hasta 2 días de uso. El producto admite el uso de enchufe, eliminando sus preocupaciones. 【Ángulo ajustable】Al ajustar libremente el ángulo de la cabeza del láser, puede hacer que el juguete dispare puntos de láser aleatorios en el suelo o en las paredes para satisfacer las preferencias de su mascota y hacer que su tiempo de juego sea más emocionante. La cabeza del láser se puede ajustar manualmente dentro de un rango de ángulo de 50° verticalmente y oscila automáticamente dentro de un rango de ángulo de 60° horizontalmente. 【Motor silencioso y duradero】Moteur dual duradero con accionamiento directo, estructura sin engranajes para un funcionamiento más silencioso, que no molestará su descanso y trabajo. 【Consejos importantes】Si hay algún problema con el producto, avísenos y haremos todo lo posible para solucionarlo.

product_details.Best Sellers Rank: #1,118 in Pet Supplies (See Top 100 in Pet Supplies)    #5 in Interactive Toys for Cats

data.customers_say: Customers find this laser toy to be of great quality and say their cats absolutely love it, keeping them entertained and busy for a while. The battery life and functionality receive mixed reviews - while some say the charge lasts quite awhile, others report it doesn't last long, and while some say it works as advertised, others mention it stops working after a month. The motion detection feature and durability also get mixed feedback, with some saying it moves fairly slowly around the room and lasts about 24 hours, while others report it's not motion-activated and breaks after only a month.

top_reviews.review_comment: Charged it, set it up 13”, turned it on and my cat immediately started to chase the light! It’s so easy and fun to watch my cat play. it’s so convenient, does all the work so will keep him entertained when I’m not home. It’s a great value and I would recommend this laser toy. As long as you place it the recommended height, the cat has no idea where the light is coming from so will not disturb it! Another reason I love this toy, no batteries required! Just charge it when needed!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great cat toy.  I would highly recommend it.
top_reviews.review_comment: I’m enjoying this cat toy. My cats love it and take turns chasing the light. They are getting exercise, and entertainment and I can crochet in peace. One of the cats noticed the movement of the machine. Knows where the red dot is coming from and wants to attack the machine but I discouraged that. A good investment as bored cats can cause mischief. The price is reasonable and it shuts itself off and automatically goes to standby and comes on when triggered by the cats movement. I would recommend this toy. Arrived quickly and in good condition.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Cats love it. They get busy
top_reviews.review_comment: The charge on this runs fast. I charge it almost everyday but my cats love it. It entertains them. Turns off on its own to save battery and then turns on after 15 to 30 minutes I believe. I just hate the duration. It stays on for 3 to 4 minutes max
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: I can't toy your cat will actually play with for more than an hour
top_reviews.review_comment: This is a great cat toy. I spent so much money on toys that but they only liked for an hour or two but she's been playing this for over a week now. It is random and fast or slow. The size is really small but that works great. It seems like it's built well works well. It does need to be charged every night as it goes off every two hours during the day. I definitely recommend this cat toy
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Totally recommend for the furry friend :)
top_reviews.review_comment: My cat Xeno has been quite bored recently despite all of the attention he receives and toys he has. Out of all of the interactive ones i got him I must say this one get most of his attention & help keeps him busy!!! I tried it on my brothers dog but he instantly knew where the beam was coming from and tried to eat the toy lol. There’s a few different modes so that way they don’t get too bored with the same movement. Over all great quality, easy to use and charges fast as well!!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Entertaining, but has a mind of its own
top_reviews.review_comment: My cat does like playing with it. It does a good job of relatively random seeming motion, and the battery life seems good. That said, the laser spot focus could be better as it's more of a small smear than a defined red dot. Also, it's motion activated, which would be a nice feature but it turns on but itself when there has been no motion in the room. Often it will already be running in an empty room, and several times my cat has been sleeping on my lap for an hour across the room only to notice the laser has turned on, and get up to go chase it. I have to cover it with a towel when it's not in use.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Keeps two 10 plus year old cats active
top_reviews.review_comment: With the toy set in the mixed mode setting, both cats are staying active chasing the laser dot. The dual direct drive motors are quiet. When activated, I cannot hear it throughout the night. It's motion-activated sensor works when the pets are in proximity to the device. The toy certainly does stay on for 15 minutes and does power down to conserve the battery. This feature also helps with preventing the cats from getting bored with it. The laser dot is not as bright as a pointer, so it might not work in an environment with lots of windows and sunshine. At night, it is nice and bright.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Fun for hours! My cat loves it so much. It stays on for 15 minutes at a time then it's motion activated. I will say the battery doesn't last too long (maybe 2 hours) but I have no issue charging it once or twice a week.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: Good for cats they liked it
top_reviews_global.review_date: Reviewed in the United Arab Emirates on July 28, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: Very good one, my cat love it and can’t stop playing with it, saved me a lot time. No need to worry my cat during the night anymore!

I was surprised to find this - and so grateful for it. My 1 year old cats wanted me to play for an hour + each night with a laser, but we lost the laser, and so I went searching for other toys that they could play with, without needing me. They love this laser toy - which looks like a security camera and is easy to recharge, easy to use, and I get to enjoy watching them without my hands cramping. Really great find - I recommend. And it's nice - I can either turn it on for the cats, or it will turn due to sensing motion

top_reviews_global.review_title: It's super cool fun for cats and owners!
top_reviews_global.review_comment: Your cat will be so happy!

Our Cat wasn't really bothered about it, the laser just seems to move around too quickly and the Cat can lose track of it and get bored, even on its lowest setting it seemed to quick, it starts off slowly but speeds up very quickly, the robot did seem a little noisy too which was distracting our cat, might work for some but not us.
